description: Before joining Public Security Section 9, Pazu was rumored by various police circles to have been a gangster in several yakuza groups in Japan. Pazu is the backup "jack-of-all-trades" for the field agents and is also a known chain smoker within the unit. Upon his first encounter with the http://anidb.net/ch1582 [Major], he remarked, "I never sleep with the same woman twice." He uses a folding knife in combat.
name: Paz
